name: Verona Music Festival

name: Misfits Inc Presents Sudan? (Album Launch) Live
about: Sudan, the 23-year-old producer, songwriter, and multi-instrumentalist from Bombay, India, is set to make his mark on the music scene with his debut album "Sudan?" releasing in June 2024. Known for his diverse sound and collaborative efforts, Sudan's solo endeavors promise to showcase his versatility and intricate artistry, with most songs entirely crafted by him. Get ready to experience a distinctive sonic journey with Sudan's upcoming album.

name: Tgid - to Groove is Divine Live in Bangalore
about: Experience TGID, a solo performance by musician-producer Sumesh Narayanan. Dive into a mix of genres and sonic experiments blending live performance, pre-produced tracks, live-looping, and on-the-go music creation. With a programmed light show enhancing the performance, Sumesh's unique percussion setup, combining the cajon and mridangam, takes center stage, showcasing his 25+ years of musical prowess. Explore his eclectic influences from classical to experimental on Spotify.

name: Asal Kolaar Live in Bangalore

name: Chandan Shetty Live in Bangalore
about: Chandan Shetty, also known as "Kannada Rapper Chandan Shetty", is an Indian film score and soundtrack composer, lyricist, and singer known for his work in the Kannada language. He gained popularity for his music in movies like Alemari, Varadanayaka, Power, Chakravyuha, and Bhajarangi. Chandan Shetty also emerged as the winner of Bigg Boss Kannada Season 5, showcasing his talent and strong presence in the industry.
